Pre-Game Insights: Scotland has a tough group in the World Cup, including matches against England, Australia, and Namibia.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Scotland has won 9 out of their last 12 T20Is, including a 2-1 series win against UAE and a clean sweep of the European qualifier.
Others: The article discusses Scotland's recent form, which has been patchier with a mixed start to the 2024-2026 League 2 cycle and two losses against Netherlands and Ireland in the recent Tri-Nation T20I series.
